## **Short Bio**
<img src="images/IMG_8623.jpg" style="width:20%; border:5px solid ; margin-right: 10px; margin-top: -50px" align="right">


Hi! I’m Xin Zhang.  

I'm currently a Ph.D. student in Statistics at [Iowa State University](https://www.iastate.edu).  

I obtained my B.S in Mathematics from [Fudan University](http://www.fudan.edu.cn), Shanghai, China. 

My full CV is available [here](files/XinZhang_CV.pdf).
